comments.body: I had never tried this drink and the truth is that the product is delicious! I will repeat fixed!
comments.author: Ruth

comments.body: I really like this drink, it is not excessively sweet (and I like that). I eat it with cereals, carob, chai tea ... I recommend it.
comments.author: Christine

comments.body: Conozco el producto y por eso lo he encargado. Lo único es que los plazos de entrega me parecen muy largos. Por lo demás todo muy bien.
comments.author: Mary

comments.body: I know the product and that is why I have ordered it. The only thing is that the delivery times seem very long. Otherwise everything very well.
comments.author: Luke

comments.body: Delicious. We all like it at home.
comments.author: Laura

comments.body: I am not satisfied with the product.
comments.author: Mark
